about_us.title: About us
about_us.subtitle: Technology for a better tomorrow.
about_us.description: Estaterally aims to provide a platform upon which real estate developers, buyers, renters, realtors and lawyers can connect and transact securely and happilly.
about_us.description_founded: We do this by providing realtors and real estate professionals a platform to build their business.
about_us.our_backers: ... and the 3,000+ backers across Kickstarter and Indiegogo that made this project possible!
about_us.ambassadors_desc: People that help us spread the word around and stand for everything we do.
